with tem_table(id,parent_id,org_name,curlevel) as ( select id, parent_id, org_name, 1 as level from dbo.sys_organization where parent_id = #{department} union all select a.id, a.parent_id, a.org_name, b.curlevel+1 from dbo.sys_organization a inner join tem_table b on (a.parent_id = b.id) ) select sys_user.id,sys_user.username, sys_user.actual_time as actualTime from tem_table,sys_user where tem_table.id=sys_user.department and sys_user.status=1

with tem_table(id,parent_id,org_name,curlevel) as (select id, parent_id, org_name, 1 as level from dbo.sys_organization where parent_id = #{department} union all select a.id, a.parent_id, a.org_name, b.curlevel+1 from dbo.sys_organization a inner join tem_table b on (a.parent_id = b.id)) select t.id,t.username,t.actualTime,o.repay_amt,o.percentage from ( select sys_user.id,sys_user.username, sys_user.actual_time as actualTime from tem_table,sys_user where tem_table.id=sys_user.department and sys_user.status=1) t left join (select odv, sum(o.repay_amt) as repay_amt, sum(o.percentage) as percentage from odv_percentage o group by odv) o on t.id=o.odv

with tem_table(id,parent_id,org_name,curlevel) as (select id, parent_id, org_name, 1 as level from dbo.sys_organization where parent_id = #{department} union all select a.id, a.parent_id, a.org_name, b.curlevel+1 from dbo.sys_organization a inner join tem_table b on (a.parent_id = b.id)) select count(1) as staffNumber from tem_table,sys_user where tem_table.id=sys_user.department and sys_user.status=1 and sys_user.delete_flag=0
